definition: complementary base pairing e.g. adenine A 腺嘌呤 pairs with thymine T 胸腺嘧啶 in DNA
pinyin: jian3 ji1 hu4 bu3 pei4 dui4

definition: base pairing (e.g. adenine A 腺嘌呤 pairs with thymine T 胸腺嘧啶 in DNA)/base pair

sentences.english: The bases and pentoses of the common nucleotides are heterocyclic compounds.
sentences.chinese: 常見核苷酸中的鹼基和戊糖是雜環化合物。

sentences.english: Nucleobases come in four types and constitute the alphabet in which the polymer encodes information.
sentences.chinese: 鹼基有四種，組成了聚合物所攜帶的遺傳密碼。

sentences.english: The lengths of the double stranded cDNA fragments were about 500 base pairs.
sentences.chinese: 其雙鏈鏈長，經凝膠電泳分析，約爲500鹼基對。

sentences.english: Uric acid as the end-product of purine metabolism in human body is excreted through kidney.
sentences.chinese: 尿酸是人體嘌呤鹼基分解代謝終產物，經腎臟排泄。

sentences.english: Basepairs substitution and point insertion were the main mutation types.
sentences.chinese: 突變類型主要是鹼基替代和點插入。

sentences.english: Among the sequences, there were a handful of insertions, deletions and substitutions.
sentences.chinese: 序列之間存在少量的插入缺失和鹼基替代。

sentences.english: NZB mice may have deletion in promotor region of Fcgr2b gene.
sentences.chinese: NZB小鼠該基因啓動子區可能存在鹼基缺失。

sentences.english: Adenine refers to a portion of the molecule, the nitrogenous base.
sentences.chinese: 腺嘌呤指分子的一部分，即含氮鹼基。

sentences.english: The human genome contains three billion DNA base pairs.
sentences.chinese: 人類的基因組包含30億個DNA鹼基對。

sentences.english: Every three basic groups represent one kind of aminoacid the password.
sentences.chinese: 每三個鹼基代表一種氨基酸的密碼。

sentences.english: And open bases can be recognised by CTCF in the egg.
sentences.chinese: 卵細胞裏面的開放鹼基對可以被CTCF識別。

sentences.english: The base compositions of ITS1 sequences of 5 tilapias species had little difference.
sentences.chinese: 羅非魚5個種的ITS1序列的鹼基組成差別不大。

sentences.english: These bases cannot be found in the NCBI reference genome.
sentences.chinese: 這些鹼基無法在NCBI的參考基因組中發現。

sentences.english: There were 481 variation locuses in the COI sequences.
sentences.chinese: COI序列鹼基中共有481個變異位點。
